meanings.definition: A festival celebrated in the town of Pakil, Laguna, Philippines, during the month of May in honor of the Nuestra Señora de los Dolores de Turumba (Our Lady of Sorrows of Turumba).
meanings.english_definition: A festival celebrated in the town of Pakil, Laguna, Philippines, during the month of May in honor of the Nuestra Señora de los Dolores de Turumba (Our Lady of Sorrows of Turumba).

examples.sentence: The Pakawan Festival is a vibrant display of faith and culture.
examples.translation: パカワン祭りは、信仰と文化の活気に満ちた展示です。

collocations: Nuestra Señora de los Dolores de Turumba

etymology.value: Derived from the name of the town Pakil.
